title: Which singer do you like best and which song is your favorite? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have so many favourites, and yes it’s too hard a choice, but I think my favourites would be as follows - Female, Indian- 1. Shweta Mohan - she has a mesmerising voice and it’s beautiful!! Her best songs are Bhor bhayee, Samkhritha pamagiri 2. Kaushiki Chakraborty- do listen to her song Laagi Laagi re Lagan!! It’s enthralling, and one of my favourites. 3. Sonu Kakkar - yep. Neha Kakkar’s sister. She has a strong and treamendously powerful voice. Listen to her Banjara, Madaari notable mentions - Shreya Ghoshal, Kavita Krishnamurthy , Anuradha Paudwal, Geeta Dutt, Asha Bhonsle Male, Indian - 1. Sukhwinder Singh - such versatility !! His voice is perfection!! Ramta Jogi, Kariye Na 2. Shankar Mahadevan- he has literally surpassed himself. All his songs are brilliant. 3. Arijit Singh - oh one hell of a versatile singer !! Again, all his songs are great ! notable mentions - ( I’ve included Pakistani singers too ) Atif Aslam, Rahat Fateh Ali Khan, Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, Adnan Sami, Ankit Tiwari , Swanand Kirkire, Nakash Aziz etc. Female, international- 1. Whitney Houston - she’s got the perfect pitch really, I will always love you!! 2. Shakira - she has a wonderful voice, and there’s no denying that. All her songs are good, but whenever wherever, hips don’t lie, clandestino are my favourites. 3. Beyoncé- oh my god, she’s got a classy, jazzy voice and I love it !! My favourites are I wish I were a boy, crazy in love. notable mentions - Melanie Martinez , Bebe Rexha, Becky G, Billie Eilish, Selena Gomez, Camilla Cabello, Rihanna, Katy Perry, Jennifer Lopez, Madonna Male, International- like there are sooooo many. But here are my favourites- Adam Levine - he’s got the range, the pitch , the voice and the looks to die for (sorry about that ) I love his songs especially Animals, Locked away, Sugar, Girls like you , Don’t wanna know, cold , one more night oh so manyyyyCharlie Puth - (yes, Jungkook’s favourite) I love his songs, and the way he sings while playing the piano, I love it all in all. See you again, attention, we don’t talk anymore and many others, I love them !3. BTS ( please don’t judge okay?!) - this is my ultimate favourite group, and I Stan them no matter what. In this group my favourite vocalist is Jungkook, followed by Taehyung and Jimin. All their songs are beautiful and it’s not easy for me to count and tell !! notable mentions - EXO ( I Stan their vocals) , Ed Sheeran, Shawn Mendez, Post Malone, J Balvin, Louis Fonsi.

When I listen to music, I’m not just paying attention to a tune. Music absorbs all my attention, all my might, and all my soul. I need lyrics that not only align with my moral code but that inspire me to become a better person and give me new strength and hope and courage to live my day with determination, love, and grace. One artist that always makes me stop and think is Anson Seabra.  Not only do I feel every word of this song echo in every part of my aching, endeavoring soul, but this song reminds me to look at others and remember that they, too, are trying their best - that they have lives that are hurting inside - that they also need as much love and encouragement as I can give them. I’m trying my best. And so are you.
